title: Feature request: Add variables to Name field
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
1. Look at the help from menu Help | mRemoteNG Help. Check the "External Tools" option from left structured tree menu. There is section Variables like %HOSTNAME% that can be used with external tools Argument field.
2. In **Connection** panel create new connection.
3. In **Config** panel for this newly created connection inside **Display** section click on **Name** field. It would be awesome if variables could be used in this **Name** field like for example:
 `Mail server %Hostname%`

   Cur...

iterations.description: Feature request to support variable/token substitution in the connection Name field, allowing dynamic names like %name%.full.local.fqdn, which aligns with existing token support in External Tools

comments.author: Tuumke
comments.snippet:
+1 for this. I'd prefer this over #2310 as i'd like my Name to be machine name and hostname the fqdn combine from a variable
```  %name%.full.local.fqdn ```

notes:
AI triage: Feature request to support variable/token substitution in the connection Name field, allowing dynamic names like %name%.full.local.fqdn, which aligns with existing token support in External Tools
Approach: Extend the existing token replacement system (already used for External Tools and protocol fields) to also process the Name/DisplayName field when rendering connections in the tree and panels, supporting tokens like %hostname%, %port%, etc.
